import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Button, Form, Grid, Header, Image, Message, Segment } from "semantic-ui-react"; export default class LoginForm extends Component { state = { usernameInput: '', passwordInput: '' } handleChange = (e, { name, value }) => console.log({ [name]: value }) render() { return (
Log-in to your account
New to us? Sign Up )
); } }
